channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America’s ‘sugar daddy’ just went broke — and you’re stuck with the bill
item.description: Japan can’t — and won’t — finance the U.S. anymore. Here’s why that matters for your money, your mortgage and basic portfolio moves.

item.title: The number of 401(k) millionaires just hit a record high: ‘People are staying the course.’
item.description: Women hit a new investment milestone but still trail men in some metrics, Fidelity said.

item.title: From price cuts to bidding wars, America’s home buyers are in two wildly different worlds
item.description: As home sales slowly recover, the Northeast and Midwest are seeing a bigger rebound than the South and the West, according to new data.

item.title: ‘There’s definitely a bubble in markets,’ Ray Dalio says. But that doesn’t mean you should sell.
item.description: The situation today is not quite the same as the dot-com bubble, but the market is about 80% of the way there, says the founder of hedge fund Bridgewa...

item.title: Walmart sales keep climbing, and it’s more than just the wealthy looking for bargains
item.description: Walmart’s stock turned sharply higher, as earnings beat expectations and the full-year outlook was raised amid strength in spending across all income ...

item.title: These stocks are in the midst of an earnings turnaround that can provide a boost, says Citi
item.description: Stocks such as CSX and Freeport-McMoRan could turn their earnings trajectories around for the better, according to Citi.

item.title: Deutsche Bank says buy the dip on this entertainment stock following ‘overdone’ decline
item.description: Deutsche Bank predicts that shares of Live Nation Entertainment could rise 23% from here.

item.title: Nvidia posted another monster quarter. Here is the number that impressed analysts the most
item.description: Nvidia was able to clear another sky high earnings bar, with analysts left most impressed by one number: its Blackwell and Rubin chips sales guidance.

item.title: It's a great time to be a Wall Street bank, and this one on our Best Stocks list is gaining momentum
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo go through this Wall Street bank on their Best Stocks list.

item.title: Only one major Nvidia analyst is saying not to buy after those big results. Here’s why
item.description: Deutsche Bank is the only bulge bracket bank to adopt a neutral rating on Nvidia.

item.title: Adobe’s $1.9B Semrush Buyout Sparks Epic Stock Rally
item.description: Adobe's $1.9B acquisition of Semrush (SEMR) sends shares soaring 74% as of Nov 19, 2025. Dive into the AI-driven deal, market reactions, risks, and le...

item.title: Olema Pharma (OLMA) Surges 140%+ on Roche Cancer Data
item.description: Olema Pharmaceuticals (OLMA) stock explodes 145% today on Roche's positive breast cancer drug data. Explore the catalyst, risks, rewards, and how simi...

item.title: PLUG Stock Explodes on UK Hydrogen Project Win
item.description: PLUG stock surges on major UK green hydrogen deal! Discover the details of Plug Power's 55 MW project win, market reactions as of Nov 17, 2025, and le...

item.title: Sigma Lithium (SGML) Rockets 40% Pre-Market on Lithium Demand Boom
item.description: Holy Cow, Look at This Move! As of this writing – 8:13 AM CST on November 17, 2025 – Sigma Lithium is absolutely on fire. We’re talking up ~40% and st...

item.title: Firefly Aerospace (FLY): A Compelling Re-Rating Opportunity in Responsive Space and Defense
item.description: Firefly Aerospace (FLY) Q3 earnings beat and raised guidance reveal its pivot to a high-margin responsive space prime contractor. Historical analogues...
